name: Mr Bunny
description: This NFT raises questions about the irreversible environmental harm caused by ETH-based NFT markets. The viewer can consciously decide to waste energy for a futile reason, but their actions cannot be reverted. The 2nd stage of the artwork actually consumes many more Watts than the 1st stage (check for yourself usingÂ tools like iStat) by running useless computations in the background, which reflect the irresponsible and unreasonable consensus protocols used, among others, by Ethereum and Bitcoin.
